name: lowercase letter
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "lowercase letter" do
    expected = 1
    actual = scrabbleScore.score "a"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: uppercase letter
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "uppercase letter" do
    expected = 1
    actual = scrabbleScore.score "A"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: valuable letter
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "valuable letter" do
    expected = 4
    actual = scrabbleScore.score "f"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: short word
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "short word" do
    expected = 2
    actual = scrabbleScore.score "at"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: short, valuable word
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "short, valuable word" do
    expected = 12
    actual = scrabbleScore.score "zoo"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: medium word
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "medium word" do
    expected = 6
    actual = scrabbleScore.score "street"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: medium, valuable word
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "medium, valuable word" do
    expected = 22
    actual = scrabbleScore.score "quirky"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: long, mixed-case word
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "long, mixed-case word" do
    expected = 41
    actual = scrabbleScore.score "OxyphenButazone"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: english-like word
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "english-like word" do
    expected = 8
    actual = scrabbleScore.score "pinata"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: empty input
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "empty input" do
    expected = 0
    actual = scrabbleScore.score ""
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: entire alphabet available
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "entire alphabet available" do
    expected = 87
    actual = scrabbleScore.score "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual
